transcript: Shut up. Shut up. I wouldn't marry you again. If you came crawling to me unbearingly, you're a mean evil-minded little vampire And I hope that God I never set eyes on you again

segments.text: Shut up. Shut up. I wouldn't marry you again. If you came crawling to me unbearingly, you're a mean evil-minded little vampire
And I hope that God I never set eyes on you again

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Shut up, shut up.  I wouldn't marry you again if you came crawling to me on bended knee. You're a mean, evil-minded little vampire and I hope to God I never set eyes on you again.
